helperText: All Q&As will be moderated before being published

items.Question: Q. Can I get this product with a later expiry date ?

Answers.Answer: A. Hi Sana, The manufacturing and expiry date of this product is mentioned on the packaging/labelled on the container. Rest assured all our products are far from expiry, and are procured directly from the brand/authorized resellers of the brand. Happy Shopping!
